What practices have you followed and failed/succeeded?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you do backend for frontend?

stories.text:
Say you have an younger sister or brother who is a first-time entrepreneur and would like to apply for a bank loan when there is a need in the future(Let us say that they are not very keen on venture capital).

They want to have as much insight as possible into their business from the financial perspective. This is for thier own sake(e.g. to make better decision) as well as to be well-prepared for future loan application(s).

What would you teach this younger sister/brother about financial modelling, forecasting and credit risk analysis so that they are able to generate their own data for analysis before making a loan application?
stories.title: Ask HN: What would you teach your younger sister/brother about finmod?

stories.text:
I saw but can't now find someone's project to crawl reddit for discussions of products in subreddits like hometheater and buildapc, providing some kind of naive sentiment analysis to give a score for various products. Was this a Show HN or did I see it somewhere else? My site searches have been failing me, things like reddit "reputation score" and "product aggregator" are faceplanting.

Maybe I stumbled on it on github and not HN... this sound familiar to anyone?
stories.title: Ask HN: Was there a Show HN about a Reddit product reputation aggregator?
